channel.title: New to all of this
channel.description:
Hello, I came here because I wanted to use the original MoparScape client, however the version on the main site gives me automatic lvl 99 in all skills and I can't save my progress. I would like to use the original MoparScape map and set up a server where I can start all skills at level one and build everything up over time to 99 as well as save my progress. I'm almost certain this has been asked before, so if someone else already has a (active) server like this, could someone please post a link to it, or even a server that doesn't deviate too much from the original version of the game.
I remember trying to find a server like this several months ago, but most of the time, the servers that I tried to log on to were inactive, and the servers that I could get into were so profoundly different from the game I wanted that I wasn't interested in them.
I am only a casual player. I have no experience in programming, but I'm almost positive that a simple tutorial can help me to design a server with the game I want without too much trouble. In fact, designing such a server would probably help me to start learning how to make changes and make the game better, design new quests, and learn about programming. Any help is appreciated.

item.title: New to all of this
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

jbiafra:

I’m not sure exactly what you meant by my views being distorted. Could you elaborate?

I honestly don’t even remember typing that, my mistake.

jbiafra:

I did find a server in the downloads section earlier that was pretty nice, but there weren’t very many quests on it. I’m still looking.

Best of luck to you.

jbiafra:

Also, I found a starter tutorial for Java on YouTube and downloaded Eclipse onto my computer. I started with learning System.out.println commands and basic math commands and I’m moving into some user imput tutorials. I also have Java Development Kit with Java Mission Control on my computer already. The tutorial I’m learning from does use Eclipse exclusively. Am I on the right track?

yes and if you don’t mind a bit of reading, this and then this helped me learn Java really quickly.

Read full topic

item.title: New to all of this
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

I think your views are a bit distorted. [quote=“jbiafra, post:1, topic:538191”]Hello, I came here because I wanted to use the original MoparScape client, however the version on the main site gives me automatic lvl 99 in all skills and I can’t save my progress. I would like to use the original MoparScape map and set up a server where I can start all skills at level one and build everything up over time to 99 as well as save my progress. I’m almost certain this has been asked before, so if someone else already has a (active) server like this, could someone please post a link to it, or even a server that doesn’t deviate too much from the original version of the game.[/quote]
Find a server in the downloads section.

jbiafra:

I am only a casual player. I have no experience in programming, but I’m almost positive that a simple tutorial can help me to design a server with the game I want without too much trouble.

Depends. This is the same thing I thought 4 years ago when I joined and here I am with still a lot more to learn. Tutorials will only take you so far.

If you need any additional help pm me.

Read full topic
